messages.content: tell me a joke about an elephant and a ant
Why did the elephant refuse to let the ant borrow its toothpaste? Because it knew the ant wouldn't be able to handle the power.
Explain to me the funny in the joke

The joke plays on the idea of an ant trying to borrow toothpaste from an elephant, which is a much larger and powerful creature. The joke is funny because it is unexpected and absurd. The elephant would not typically allow an ant to borrow its toothpaste because the ant would not be able to handle the power of the toothpaste. The joke is a play on words, as toothpaste is a powder, and the joke is a play on words.
